name: AR: Altered Reality Prologue
description:
Use your AR Goggles to fight the alien overlords that control the world in this short metroidvania-style adventure.

Controls-

Arrow keys- move
Shift- jump
Z- hold to run
Space bar - toggles goggles on and off
Ctrl- Shoots a beam while goggles are on.

If your PC flags it as a virus, don't worry, I swear it isn't! Turn off real-time scanning before you run the game if it keeps getting flagged and deleted. Sorry!
